Our Journey Through the Cards: Unveiling the History of Gambling Genius Embark on a journey through time with Gambling Genius as we trace our roots and evolution in the realm of casino expertise. Born from a passion for games of chance and skill, our story began with a simple yet ambitious goal: to demystify the world of casinos and empower players with knowledge. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Gambling Genius GamblingGenius ☰ Who we are Resources News Purchase Privacy Policy Welcome to Gambling Genius! We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you visit our website. 1. Information We Collect 1.1 Personal Information We may collect personal information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide. 1.2 Usage Data We may collect information about how you access and use our website. This may include information such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit. 2. How We Use Your Information 2.1 To Provide and Maintain Our Service We use your information to provide and maintain our website, including to monitor the usage of our service. 2.2 To Communicate with You We may use your personal information to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials, and other information that may be of interest to you. 3. Sharing Your Information 3.1 Third-Party Service Providers We may share your information with third-party service providers to perform certain services on our behalf, such as hosting our website or sending email communications. 3.2 Legal Requirements We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities. 4. Security of Your Information We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information, but please remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. 5. Your Data Protection Rights You have certain data protection rights, including the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at gamblinggenius@gmail.com. 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: Email: gamblinggenius@gmail.com Address TV Dr. José da Silva Passos 143, 4450-008 Matosinhos, Portugal Email gamblinggenius@gmail.com Phone +351-23-756-8712 The content on this site is solely for educational purposes and does not promise success in casino games. Dear Visitor We at Gambling Genius want to extend our heartfelt thanks for visiting our website. Your interest and support mean a lot to us.
